title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
A simplified answer is not required for the first point.

The second point may be earned for consistent and correct use of an incorrect slope in the equation.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
A simplified answer is not required. Trigonometric function values do not need to be evaluated. Units are not required.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include a correct speed.
The student response accurately includes a correct speed.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
The first point requires the setup, i.e., the equation to be solved.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
